com.camerontec.util.logger.hpl

Interface IHighPerformanceLoggerAppender

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IHighPerformanceLogEventListener<HighPerformanceLogEvent>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHighPerformanceAppender, HighPerformanceAsynchronousAppender, HighPerformanceSynchronousAppender

    public interface IHighPerformanceLoggerAppender
extends IHighPerformanceLogEventListener<HighPerformanceLogEvent>
    Interface to be implemented by Catalys high performance logger appenders.

    • Method Summary

        onHighPerformanceLogEvent

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
    throws IOException
        Start the appender.

        This is an optional operation and subclasses only need implement if required.

        Throws:
        IOException - When the appender file cannot locate or create the log file.

      • start

        void start(CyclicBarrier barrier)
    throws IOException
        Start the appender, awaiting on the specified barrier first.

        This is an optional operation and subclasses only need implement if required.

        Parameters:
        barrier - The barrier on which to await.
        Throws:
        IOException - When the appender file cannot locate or create the log file.

      • stop

        void stop()
   throws InterruptedException
        Stop the appender.

        This is an optional operation any subclasses only need implement if required. However, subclasses must guarantee that all pending logs are flushed to the log file before shutting down.

        Throws:
        InterruptedException - When interrupted while awaiting for a shutdown.

      • clean

        void clean()
    throws IOException
        Optional operation. Attempt to reset internal resource usage to their default levels.

        Depending on the implementation this can be a disruptive operation and is designed to be used only in periods of relative inactivity in long running applications.

        Whether or not additional logging events are accepted during this operation is implementation dependent.

        This operation is likely to generate garbage. The caller should consider forcing a garbage collection on completion to have some control over when it is collected.

        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - If not supported by the implementation.
        IOException - When the appender file cannot locate or create the log file.

      • registerMBean

        void registerMBean(MBeanServer mbeanServer,
                   ObjectName parentObjectName)
        Register the appender MBean (if applicable).
        Parameters:
        mbeanServer - The MBean server.
        parentObjectName - The parent MBean's object name.

      • unregisterMBean

        void unregisterMBean(MBeanServer mbeanServer)
        Unregister the appender MBean (if applicable).
        Parameters:
        mbeanServer - The MBean server.
